{{cpp/title|visit_format_arg}}
{{cpp/utility/format/navbar}}

{{ddcl| header=format | since=c++20 | deprecated=c++26 |1=
template&lt; class Visitor, class Context &gt;
/* see below */ visit_format_arg( Visitor&amp;&amp; vis, std::basic_format_arg&lt;Context&gt; arg );
}}

Applies the visitor {{tt|vis}} to the object contained in {{tt|arg}}.

Equivalent to {{c|std::visit(std::forward&lt;Visitor&gt;(vis), value)}}, where {{tt|value}} is the {{lc|std::variant}} stored in {{tt|arg}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | vis | a {{named req|Callable}} that accepts every possible alternative from {{tt|arg}}}}
{{par | arg | a {{lc|std::basic_format_arg}} to be visited}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The value returned by the selected invocation of the visitor.

===Notes===
As of C++26, {{tt|std::visit_format_arg}} is deprecated in favor of the {{tt|visit}} member functions of {{lc|std::basic_format_arg}}.
